title: Manikya Polki Kundan Ring - A Timeless Heirloom
materials: adorned with exquisite uncut Polki diamonds and vibrant Manikya (Ruby) accents. Hyderabadi Polished for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning ring features a floral motif meticulously handcrafted with traditional Kundan setting. The central Polki diamond is surrounded by smaller, carefully placed Polkis and is flanked by the bright red accent colors around the edges. The overall design reflects Mughal and South Indian design sensibilities, making it a true statement piece.
colors: with a vibrant touch of Ruby Red (Manikya) accents.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranti
and other special occasions. A regal choice for the modern bride and a treasured addition to any heirloom collection.
description: This exquisite ring embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry design with the Hyderabadi finesse. The use of Polki diamonds, known for their unique uncut beauty, elevates the piece to a heirloom status. Its enduring design and impeccable craftsmanship make it a worthwhile investment and a conversation starter.
